Title: Crossing the 10,000 li Yangzi River
Publisher: Renmin tiyu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Commemoration of Mao’s famous swim in the Yangzi river near the Yangzi River Bridge in Wuhan, July 1966. It is a demonstration of his strength, just before he unleashes the Cultural Revolution.The Mao portrait is a large version of the 1969 poster/photograph by Qian Sijie (錢嗣傑).
Theme: Chairman Mao swims across the Yangzi
